name: The Cube Game (CMFC Studios)
description:
It's exactly what it says in the title. A game about a red cube.

The cube moves forward indefinitely (unless it game overs or you finish the game), and your job is to move it so it doesn't crash into the numerous obstacles.

You can move the cube left with the a key, or right with the d key. Make sure to avoid falling off the platform, too.
